<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Cascade Countermeasure](/Spells.aspx?ID=1036)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

**Requirements** You're benefiting from Arcane Cascade.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the Arcane Cascade stance ends
</row>

</column>

---

You quickly adjust your Arcane Cascade to offer magical protection. You gain resistance 5 against damage from spells. As normal, using Arcane Cascade again means you've ended the stance, and the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+3)** The resistance increases by 5.
